players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I am the detective and I investigated her last night."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Bob's claim is suspicious because he immediately accused me without evidence."
Diana: "Alice, if you're innocent, why are you so defensive? Bob's claim is the only lead we have. I'm leaning towards believing him."
You: "Alice is telling the truth — Bob's quick accusation seems like a desperate move to protect himself. We should focus on gathering more info before rushing to judge."
Bob: "Alice is clearly the mafioso. I revealed my investigation early to save time and prevent more town deaths. We can't afford to wait any longer."
